devdoc.details: Public functions calling external contracts do not guard against reentrancy because they are expected to be called via delegatecall, which will execute this contract's logic within the context of the originating contract. For example, the HubPool will delegatecall these functions, therefore its only necessary that the HubPool's methods that call this contract's logic guard against reentrancy.

params._bridgeHub: The bridge hub contract address for the ZkStack network.
params._cctpTokenMessenger: address of the CCTP token messenger contract for the configured network.
params._chainId: The target ZkStack network's chain ID.
params._circleUSDC: Circle USDC address on L1. If not set to address(0), then either the USDCSharedBridge or CCTP token messenger must be set and will be used to bridge this token.
params._customGasTokenFunder: Contract on L1 which funds bridge fees with amounts in the custom gas token.
params._l1GasToL2GasPerPubDataLimit: The exchange rate of l1 gas to l2 gas.
params._l2GasLimit: The maximum amount of gas this contract is willing to pay to execute a transaction on L2.
params._l2RefundAddress: address that recieves excess gas refunds on L2.
params._maxTxGasprice: The maximum effective gas price any transaction sent to this adapter may have.
params._recipientCircleDomainId: Circle domain ID for the destination network.
params._usdcSharedBridge: Address of the second bridge contract for USDC corresponding to the configured ZkStack network.

relayMessage(address,bytes).details: The CUSTOM_GAS_TOKEN_FUNDER must hold enough of the gas token to pay for the L2 txn.

params.target: Contract on L2 that will receive message.

relayTokens(address,address,uint256,addr.details: The CUSTOM_GAS_TOKEN_FUNDER must hold enough of the gas token to pay for the L2 txn.

params.amount: Amount of L1 tokens to deposit and L2 tokens to receive.

constructor.notice: Constructs new Adapter.Circle bridged & native USDC are optionally supported via configuration, but are mutually exclusive.

relayMessage(address,bytes).notice: Send cross-chain message to target on ZkStack.

userdoc.notice: Contract containing logic to send messages from L1 to ZkStack with a custom gas token.
